content: This is a **list of shopping malls** in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore), sorted by [regions](/wiki/Regions_of_Singapore). Some listed shopping malls here are also inclusive as a [mixed-use development](/wiki/Mixed-use_development) and or part of a neighbourhood plaza. ## Central - [Alexandra Retail Centre](/wiki/Alexandra_Retail_Centre) - [Bugis Junction](/wiki/Bugis_Junction) - [Bugis+](/wiki/Bugis%2B) - [Capitol Piazza](/wiki/Capitol_Piazza) - [Cathay Cineleisure Orchard](/wiki/Cathay_Cineleisure_Orchard) - [The Centrepoint](/wiki/The_Centrepoint) - [City Square Mall](/wiki/City_Square_Mall_(Singapore)) - [CityLink Mall](/wiki/CityLink_Mall) - [Chinatown Point](/wiki/Chinatown_Point) - [Duo](/wiki/DUO) - [Far East Plaza](/wiki/Far_East_Plaza) - [Funan](/wiki/Funan,_Singapore) - [Great World City](/wiki/Great_World_City) - [HarbourFront Centre](/wiki/HarbourFront_Centre) - [HDB Hub](/wiki/HDB_Hub) - [Holland Village Shopping Mall](/wiki/Holland_Village,_Singapore) - [ION Orchard](/wiki/ION_Orchard) - [Junction 8](/wiki/Junction_8_Shopping_Centre) - [Liat Towers](/wiki/Liat_Towers) - [Lucky Plaza](/wiki/Lucky_Plaza) - [Marina Bay Sands](/wiki/Marina_Bay_Sands) - [Marina Bay Link Mall](/wiki/Marina_Bay_Link_Mall) - [Marina Square](/wiki/Marina_Square) - [Millenia Walk](/wiki/Millenia_Walk) - [Mustafa Centre](/wiki/Mustafa_Centre) - [Ngee Ann City](/wiki/Ngee_Ann_City) - [Orchard Central](/wiki/Orchard_Central) - [Orchard Gateway](/wiki/Orchard_Gateway) - [Palais Renaissance](/wiki/Palais_Renaissance) - [The Paragon](/wiki/The_Paragon,_Singapore) - [People's Park Centre](/wiki/People%27s_Park_Centre) - [People's Park Complex](/wiki/People%27s_Park_Complex) - [Plaza Singapura](/wiki/Plaza_Singapura) - [Raffles City](/wiki/Raffles_City_Singapore) - [Shaw House and Centre](/wiki/Shaw_House_and_Centre) - [Sim Lim Square](/wiki/Sim_Lim_Square) - [The South Beach](/wiki/South_Beach,_Singapore) - [Square 2](/wiki/Square_2_(shopping_mall)) - [Suntec City](/wiki/Suntec_City) - [Tanjong Pagar Centre](/wiki/Tanjong_Pagar_Centre) - [Tekka Centre](/wiki/Tekka_Centre) - [Tiong Bahru Plaza](/wiki/Tiong_Bahru_Plaza) - [Thomson Plaza](/wiki/Thomson_Plaza) - [Novena Square Shopping Mall](/wiki/Novena_Square_Shopping_Mall) - [VivoCity](/wiki/VivoCity) - [Wheelock Place](/wiki/Wheelock_Place) - [Wisma Atria](/wiki/Wisma_Atria) ## East - [Bedok Mall](/wiki/Bedok_Mall) - [Century Square](/wiki/Century_Square) - [Changi City Point](/wiki/Changi_City_Point) - [Downtown East](/wiki/NTUC_Downtown_East) - [Eastpoint Mall](/wiki/Eastpoint_Mall,_Singapore) - [Jewel Changi Airport](/wiki/Jewel_Changi_Airport) - [Katong Shopping Centre](/wiki/Katong_Shopping_Centre) - [Kallang Wave Mall](/wiki/Kallang_Wave_Mall) - [Leisure Park Kallang](/wiki/Leisure_Park_Kallang) - [i12 Katong](/wiki/I12_Katong) - [Our Tampines Hub](/wiki/Our_Tampines_Hub) - [Parkway Parade](/wiki/Parkway_Parade) - Paya Lebar Quarter - Paya Lebar Square - [SingPost](/wiki/SingPost) Centre - [Tampines 1](/wiki/Tampines_1) - [Tampines Mall](/wiki/Tampines_Mall) - [White Sands](/wiki/White_Sands_Shopping_Mall,_Singapore) ## North - [AMK Hub](/wiki/AMK_Hub) - [Canberra Plaza](/wiki/Canberra_Plaza) - [Causeway Point](/wiki/Causeway_Point) - [Northpoint City](/wiki/Northpoint_City,_Singapore) - [Sembawang Shopping Centre](/wiki/Sembawang_Shopping_Centre) - [Sun Plaza](/wiki/Sun_Plaza,_Singapore) ## North-East - [Compass One](/wiki/Compass_One) - [Heartland Mall](/wiki/Heartland_Mall) - [Hougang Mall](/wiki/Hougang_Mall) - [NEX](/wiki/Nex,_Singapore) - [Oasis Terraces](/wiki/Oasis_Terraces) - [Punggol Plaza](/wiki/Punggol_Plaza) - Punggol Coast Mall - [The Seletar Mall](/wiki/Seletar_Mall) - [Waterway Point](/wiki/Waterway_Point) - Northshore Plaza I - Northshore Plaza II - Anchorvale Village - Sengkang Grand Mall - Hougang Village ## West - Bukit Panjang Plaza - Dairy Farm Mall - Fajar Shopping Centre - [Gek Poh Shopping Centre](/wiki/Gek_Poh_Shopping_Centre) - Greenridge Shopping Centre - [Hillion Mall](/wiki/Hillion_Mall) - [IMM](/wiki/IMM_(Singapore)) - [Jem](/wiki/Jem_(shopping_mall)) - [West Coast Plaza](/wiki/West_Coast_Plaza) - [Westgate](/wiki/Westgate_(Singapore)) - [West Mall](/wiki/West_Mall) - Yew Tee Point
title: List of shopping malls in Singapore
